00048 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 //  This is a simple class that lets us do easy (though not terribly efficient)
00050 //  trancoding of char* data to XMLCh data.
00051 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 class XStr
00053 {
00054 public :
00055     XStr(const char* const toTranscode)
00056     {
00057         fUnicodeForm = XMLString::transcode(toTranscode);
00058     }
00059 
00060     ~XStr()
00061     {
00062         XMLString::release(&fUnicodeForm);
00063     }
00064 
00065     const XMLCh* unicodeForm() const
00066     {
00067         return fUnicodeForm;
00068     }
00069 
00070 private :
00071     XMLCh*   fUnicodeForm;
00072 };
00073 
00074 #define X(str) XStr(str).unicodeForm()
